long_description: The Benchmade 915 Triage SBK-ORG knife offers dynamic utility in an emergency, serving triple duty as a knife, safety cutter and glass breaker. 57-59HRC steel sheepsfoot blade is highly resistant to corrosion and features the rock-solid AXIS(R) locking mechanism. Hook-shape, 58-60HRC steel safety cutter slices easily through canvas, parachute cord and webbing material. Carbide glass breaker can shatter a window with a single blow. The Benchmade 915 Triage SBK-ORG knife features a textured G10 polymer handle with a 420J stainless-steel liner and a reversible pocket clip.
short_description: The Benchmade 915 Triage SBK-ORG knife offers dynamic utility in an emergency, serving triple duty as a knife, safety cutter and glass breaker.
